FuncDef: The display isis system-id conflict command displays information about system ID conflicts (if any). The display isis system-id conflict command displays information about system ID conflicts (if any).
CLIs: display isis system-id conflict [ level-1 | level-2 ] [ <process-id> | { vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> } ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about Level-1 system ID conflicts.
-

Displays information about Level-2 system ID conflicts.
-

Displays information about system ID conflicts in a specified IS-IS process.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Displays information about system ID conflicts in a specified VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces. The VPN instance name cannot be _public_. If the character string is quoted by double quotation marks, the character string can contain spaces.
